abstract: Medtronic said that it was giving $2.5 million to Yale to oversee a review of the study data that examined a bone growth product’s safety and effectiveness.
snippet: Medtronic said that it was giving $2.5 million to Yale to oversee a review of the study data that examined a bone growth product’s safety and effectiveness.
lead_paragraph: Facing intensifying scrutiny over one of its bone growth products, Medtronic announced Wednesday that it was giving a $2.5 million grant to Yale to oversee a complete review of the study data that examined the product’s safety and effectiveness.

headline.main: Medtronic Giving Yale Grant to Review Bone Growth Data
headline.print_headline: Medtronic Giving Yale Grant To Review Bone Growth Data
